reviews.review: 我是真的喜欢这一作的弹道，感觉比1.6版和go版还要容易

Bester CounterStrike Teil.
Immer wieder schön zu spielen.
Just started playing this game and am really excited to start earning my rent money through its online expanded trading system
графика норм и пули летят прямооооо !!!!!!!!!! МНЕ НРАВИТСЯ
after 20 hours of playing, it's a pretty good fps that people still play it to this day.
It's the best Counter Strike game ever !!!
iTS VERY SIMILLAR TO CS 1.6 AND THE FEEL IS CS 1.6

Maybe the best Counter Strike title. Here some pros :P

Pros: - Better community
         - Shift works like a charm
         - Bunch o' funny servers
         - Comfy mini-map
         - Bullets they pass through sheet metal and doors
         - Awesome gameplay

A classic, CS Source might not be the best for gameplay compared to 1.6 or CSGO but what keeps this game alive is the community, if you want to play a cheap community run based game, CS Source is worth a shot
il miglior fps competitivo della storia
Я раньше играл в кс 16 но потом когда купил кс сурс мне она больне зашла я ни пожелел о покупки
Das game hat schon paar jahre auf dem buckel aber läuft
pretty much the high FPS version of CS:GO without the stupid war paints to waist money on
Basicamente o clássico 1.6 com gráficos melhorados e sem algumas features que irritavam, tais como comprar munição e escudos a prova de tudo. Espere uma promoção e compre sem medo algum.
контра она и в России контра
It's like CS:GO but people don't know how the guns work, so if you're like me and remember, you just go in and clean house. Then everybody gets really angry and cry like babies. Waaaaah.
我是新手，玩的很菜，电脑带不动csgo，就玩这个了，感觉玩着还不错。37不白花。

Esse é aquele irmão do meio, que nasceu numa família bacana, onde o irmão mais velho(1.6) já é rico, bem sucedido, inteligente e filantropo, casado com uma bela mulher e com dois belos filhos, e o irmão mais novo(GO) faz sucesso na escola entre as meninas. Porém ele, o irmão do meio, não passa de um agiota safado que toma viagra aos 27 anos.
一款老前辈游戏的画质，到现在都非常不错，就是早上人有点少，只能打BOT，比较无聊。3软妹币还是很香的
Apesar de antigo, o jogo continua top.
It's one of the most legendary game franchises ever, needs no introduction.
Cult spel... dat op iedere PC draait (bijna) en waar je flink kunt rushen... maar ook snipen is gaaf...
Super jeu 100 fois mieux que CSGO les personne tres gentille , et aucun gosse de 10 ans vous feras chier
Its old and horrible looking but god damn it its quite a lot of fun especially online it can run on a toaster as well.
